title: Increase in labor productivity...output and wages

content.question: In an economy in which all prices, including wages, are completely flexible, an increase in labor productivity will result in which of the following changes in output and real wages?

choices.label:
Output
 Real Wages

Decrease
 No change

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
